userStories.question: Whatâ€™s your best coping strategy?
userStories.tip: Once removed, push fluids. 2-3 liters of water a day.

userStories.question: Besides medications, what else has worked for you?
userStories.tip: Fluids. Drinking 2-3 liters of water a day seems to be a non-pharma preventative.

carousel_items: Drink plenty of water while taking this medication.
Take with food or milk to prevent an upset stomach.
It takes at least 2 to 6 weeks to experience the full benefit of this medication.
Your doctor can run blood tests to make sure the medication is working as it should.

clock.tip: Take after meals and drink plenty of water.

basics.benefits_moa: Allopurinol is a type of medicine called a xanthine oxidase inhibitor. It lowers uric acid levels in your blood, which prevents gout attacks and certain types of kidney stones.
basics.bottom_line: Allopurinol works well to prevent gout attacks and is cheaper than some alternatives, but it takes a few weeks to kick in.
downsides: Can actually increase the number of gout attacks in the first few weeks.
It can take 2 to 6 weeks to feel the full effects of the medication.
You should drink a lot of fluids to prevent kidney stones from forming while taking this medication.

downsides_processed.orig: Can actually increase the number of gout attacks in the first few weeks.
It can take 2 to 6 weeks to feel the full effects of the medication.
You should drink a lot of fluids to prevent kidney stones from forming while taking this medication.

upsides: Works well to lower the amount of uric acid in the body to reduce gout attacks.

upsides_processed.orig: Works well to lower the amount of uric acid in the body to reduce gout attacks.

userStories.tip: I was taking Allopurinol from 2000. I underwent for an operation in the big toe and subsequently in Elbow joint due to Gout problem.

userStories.identifier: 51 years old slightly obese not fit
userStories.tip: I used to use it long term for gout prevention but essentially after a year i weaned off. Now if i get an inkling of an attack, I take about 1000mg and it works to stop the attack. I know that's not the indicated way, but

I'm on just about the lowest dose available (100mg 2x daily) and my uric acid is very well controlled, plus I don't have to been too fussy with my diet (e.g., I can consume mushrooms, spinach, etc., and other relatively high purine foods).

drugs.name: Allopurinol

off-label_indications.indication: High uric acid from taking a thiazide

carousel_items_processed.orig: Drink plenty of water while taking this medication.
Take with food or milk to prevent an upset stomach.
It takes at least 2 to 6 weeks to experience the full benefit of this medication.
Your doctor can run blood tests to make sure the medication is working as it should.

risks_warnings.title: Increased gout attacks
risks_warnings.description: People who first start Allopurinol can experience increased gout attacks as they take the medication for the first few weeks. This is common. Your doctor can prescribe other medications to prevent these attacks from occurring.

description_processed.orig: People who first start Allopurinol can experience increased gout attacks as they take the medication for the first few weeks. This is common. Your doctor can prescribe other medications to prevent these attacks from occurring.

risks_warnings.title: Kidney stones
risks_warnings.description: People who take Allopurinol can be more likely to have kidney stones, especially if you're dehydrated. Drink at least 10 to 12 eight ounce glasses of water every day to help prevent that from happening.

description_processed.orig: People who take Allopurinol can be more likely to have kidney stones, especially if you're dehydrated. Drink at least 10 to 12 eight ounce glasses of water every day to help prevent that from happening.

risks_warnings.title: Skin rash
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of people taking Allopurinol who get a severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of people taking Allopurinol who get a severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

risks_warnings.title: Liver disease
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of people on Allopurinol who have suffered liver damage sometimes to the point of liver transplant. This has been rare. If you notice yellowing of the eyes or skin, dark urine, or abdominal pain, talk to your doctor.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of people on Allopurinol who have suffered liver damage sometimes to the point of liver transplant. This has been rare. If you notice yellowing of the eyes or skin, dark urine, or abdominal pain, talk to your doctor.

carousel_items: Can cause dizziness or fainting in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Take the extended release tablet with breakfast.
You might need to check your blood pressure from time to time while taking this medicine.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.

basics.benefits_moa: Doxazosin is a selective alpha blocker. It relaxes the urethra and prostate, which makes it easier to urinate. It also lowers blood pressure by relaxing blood vessels.
basics.bottom_line: For men, Doxazosin will help make it easier to urinate so that you're not getting up a lot at night. It's a last-choice treatment for high blood pressure.
downsides: A last-choice treatment for high blood pressure because other medicines are more effective at preventing heart disease. Your doctor might add it to a medicine you're already taking if your blood pressure is still too high.

downsides_processed.orig: A last-choice treatment for high blood pressure because other medicines are more effective at preventing heart disease. Your doctor might add it to a medicine you're already taking if your blood pressure is still too high.

upsides: A first-choice treatment for enlarged prostate. Makes it easier to urinate.

upsides_processed.orig: A first-choice treatment for enlarged prostate. Makes it easier to urinate.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and makes it easier to urinate.

userStories.tip: It effects your mood after a few weeks and caused anxiety attacks for me after three months. Also headaches and dizziness on a daily basis. Heart consultant told me to stop taking it. Only a 1mg doseage for me but enough to cause problems
userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping

userStories.tip: Take it at bedtime everyday for BPH symptoms

drugs.name: Cardura

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness or fainting in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Take the extended release tablet with breakfast.
You might need to check your blood pressure from time to time while taking this medicine.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Dizziness or fainting may occur when taking Doxazosin when you change positions, such as going from a seated or lying down position to standing because of changes in your blood pressure, which may lead to falls. This is called orthostatic hypotension. Be very careful when changing positions, especially if you're just starting to take Doxazosin or if changes in dosing have to be made. Talk to your doctor if the dizziness doesn't go away or if you find it bothersome.

description_processed.orig: Dizziness or fainting may occur when taking Doxazosin when you change positions, such as going from a seated or lying down position to standing because of changes in your blood pressure, which may lead to falls. This is called orthostatic hypotension. Be very careful when changing positions, especially if you're just starting to take Doxazosin or if changes in dosing have to be made. Talk to your doctor if the dizziness doesn't go away or if you find it bothersome.

risks_warnings.title: Painful erection
risks_warnings.description: Rare reports of a painful erection unrelieved by sex have been reported by men who take Doxazosin, which is also called priapism. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop this as impotence can happen if this isn't treated in time.

description_processed.orig: Rare reports of a painful erection unrelieved by sex have been reported by men who take Doxazosin, which is also called priapism. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop this as impotence can happen if this isn't treated in time.

risks_warnings.title: Intraoperative floppy iris syndrome
risks_warnings.description: If you are planning to have surgery for cataracts, let your surgeon know that you are taking Doxazosin as a rare condition called intraoperative floppy iris syndrome has been known to happen. Your surgeon will tell you if adjustments need to be made.

description_processed.orig: If you are planning to have surgery for cataracts, let your surgeon know that you are taking Doxazosin as a rare condition called intraoperative floppy iris syndrome has been known to happen. Your surgeon will tell you if adjustments need to be made.

carousel_items: Take this 30 minutes after the same meal every day.
Can cause dizziness, muscle pain, headache and stuffy/runny nose.
Can cause changes in sex drive.
Don't stop taking this medication suddenly without talking to your doctor.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Tamsulosin is an alpha-1 blocker. It specifically targets and relaxes muscles in your prostate, which makes it easier to urinate.
basics.bottom_line: Tamsulosin is a first-choice treatment for enlarged prostate, and it's available as a generic. However, it can cause changes in your sex drive and can take a while to kick in.
downsides: Has to be taken the same time every day.
It can take up to one month to see the full effects of the medication.
Tamsulosin can't be stopped suddenly, so you'll need to talk to your doctor about how to stop taking it safely.
It doesn't shrink the size of the prostate.

downsides_processed.orig: Has to be taken the same time every day.
It can take up to one month to see the full effects of the medication.
Tamsulosin can't be stopped suddenly, so you'll need to talk to your doctor about how to stop taking it safely.
It doesn't shrink the size of the prostate.

upsides: First-choice medication for relieving the symptoms of an enlarged prostate.
Also available in a combination form with another medication to treat more severe symptoms of an enlarged prostate.
Since it works only on the muscles around the prostate, it has fewer blood pressure and heart-related side effects than other medicines in the same class.

upsides_processed.orig: First-choice medication for relieving the symptoms of an enlarged prostate.
Also available in a combination form with another medication to treat more severe symptoms of an enlarged prostate.
Since it works only on the muscles around the prostate, it has fewer blood pressure and heart-related side effects than other medicines in the same class.

userStories.tip: After a discussion with my doc, I recently upped my one pill Tamsulosin .4 mg dosage to two pills (.8 mg). BIG IMPROVEMENT!. Much better flow and far fewer urges to urinate. So glad I asked about an increased dosage. No side effects.
If I eat the wrong food or inhale the wrong fumes it doesn't work.  Then I have to get a catheter in. Seems like I have a spasm and after a couple hours I'm okay again
may cause atrial fib...so get checked periodically
Once the level was built up I found I could take it every other day.
Took in the morning after breakfast
Retrograde ejaculation, meaning that when you ejaculate, nothing comes out, or very little. This side effect is sporatic, so you never know how much is going to come out. Not a contraceptive!

drugs.name: Flomax

off-label_indications.indication: Difficulty urinating due to spinal cord injury
condition_url_name: Difficulty urinating due to spinal cord injury

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take this 30 minutes after the same meal every day.
Can cause dizziness, muscle pain, headache and stuffy/runny nose.
Can cause changes in sex drive.
Don't stop taking this medication suddenly without talking to your doctor.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: People on Tamsulosin can experience lowered blood pressure which can cause dizziness and falls. This usually happens when you first start taking the medication. Your body should adjust to it after the first few days. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position.
risk_factors: Taking medications for high blood pressure

description_processed.orig: People on Tamsulosin can experience lowered blood pressure which can cause dizziness and falls. This usually happens when you first start taking the medication. Your body should adjust to it after the first few days. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position.

risks_warnings.title: Rash
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of severe skin rash that can require hospitalization or can cause death. These have been rare. Talk to your doctor immediately if you suddenly develop a severe blistering skin rash with fever.

risks_warnings.title: Intraoperative floppy iris syndrome
risks_warnings.description: If you're going to have eye surgery, let your surgeon know you're taking Tamsulosin since a rare condition can occur to the eyes during the surgery that's caused by the medication.

description_processed.orig: If you're going to have eye surgery, let your surgeon know you're taking Tamsulosin since a rare condition can occur to the eyes during the surgery that's caused by the medication.

risks_warnings.title: Heat stroke
risks_warnings.description: People on Tamsulosin can be more likely to have heat stroke. Drink plenty of fluids if you're going to be in hot weather, especially if you're going to be exercising or drinking alcohol.

description_processed.orig: People on Tamsulosin can be more likely to have heat stroke. Drink plenty of fluids if you're going to be in hot weather, especially if you're going to be exercising or drinking alcohol.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in sex drive
risks_warnings.description: People on Tamsulosin can experience changes in their sex drive. Talk to your doctor if you find this bothers you.

description_processed.orig: People on Tamsulosin can experience changes in their sex drive. Talk to your doctor if you find this bothers you.
